name: Escape From Arctic Lab
description:
You play as a robot freed from a long frozen lab.  As the ice begins to melt you take your opportunity to get out of Arctic Labs.  

Xbox Controller (best if played with controller)

Left stick to move
A to jump
Select to restart level

Keyboard
WASD to move
Space to jump
Backspace to restart level

Escape to quit game

Graphics settings in the main menu

Created By Vincent Bey
Thanks for playing!!
